reviewDetails.comment: Super friendly, clear and straightforward in his diagnosis and next steps, and very helpful with recommendations for follow-up care.

He was very attentive and asked detailed questions about what I am experiencing. His exam was very thorough with commendable bedside manners, which I have to mention, due to the sensitive nature and area of my injury. He also explained to me my condition and the next steps in the treatment.
Very friendly and good bedside manner. He took time to listen to and answer all questions.
Dr. Litchfield was kind, courteous, and down to earth.
He was great. good listener. went above and beyond. Very friendly.
he is outstanding all around

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Wagner has been my physician for over 20 years. He is one of the smartest doctors I've ever been to and I have complete confidence in him. Even if I expect to see a specialist, I always make an appointment with Dr. Wagner to get the benefit of his advice. It has really been a privilege to be cared for by him.
One of the rare doctors who takes time to listen to his patients. His practice is relatively small and the personnel is very professional and welcoming
Good communication skills

I didn't have to wait long, everyone in the reception area were wearing mask.

Me and the doctor communicate well.  Overall good experience.

I've been seeing Dr. Wagner for a while now and he's amazing. He is the only doctor that I can see during my lunch hour because he is always prompt and professional, kind. I highly recommend Dr. Wagner.
Dr. Wagner has always made me comfortable and tells it like it is. A great doctor

reviewDetails.comment: He is obviously expert, but also listened carefully to what I was concerned about and answered my questions fully.

I really just saw Dr Feldman for my annual colonoscopy (I am 61 with a family history on that front) and endoscopy, but I really like how he asks what my GP is doing and all the meds that I am on.  Though I view him as a specialist, he is trying to piece together all of the pieces and i really appreciate that.  Some specialists just stay in their silos.
I was just another person to him. Kind of cold.
Dr. Feldman is an amazing doctor who is thorough, patient, and gives you all the time you need to discuss treatments. I feel very well taken care of every visit.
good doctor

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Zhou was professional and caring. She was great with my preschooler.

The office was great, the eye exams were fast and the doctor was very helpful with updating me on my vision.
This is a wonderful place I wouldn't mind revisiting

Dr. Zhou has a great bedside manner.  She was concerned about my well being.  Dr. Zhou performed various test and took the time to ask questions . She didn't rush through the appointment .  After the test were completed and she asked her probing questions,  Dr. Zhou took the time to explain what was going on with my situation in an assuring manner.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Zhou.
Friendly doctor, efficient, and knows her craft. Confident.
